channel.title: Some DarkBASIC
channel.description:
Im not sure if this is where this goes... but it says General programming :D, anyways.. DarkBASIC is a language that is mainly used for making 3D FPS, RPG, MMORPG, RTS... Etc... Games.
Here is a lil code I put together, it is simple. Like a leveling and health+strength raising type thing. (I was bored lol :D) BTW if you ever need help with making a game... im here! :D (I know VB,Java,and a lil C#) :D Great with DarkBASIC though :D:D
[code]REM Project: Bored REM Created: 7/15/2008 12:16:04 AM By Tenacious T REM REM ***** Main Source File ***** REM Health#=100 healthwords$="Your health is now " Print Healthwords$+str$(health#) wait key cls Print "You have leveled up!" wait key cls Strength#=15 Strength$="your Strength is now " Inc Health#,12 Print Healthwords$+str$(Health#) wait key cls print strength$+str$(strength#) wait key cls print "your now lvl 15000" wait key cls INC Health#,15090 Print Healthwords$+Str$(Health#) wait key cls Inc Strength#,15000 print strength$+str$(strength#) wait key cls [/code]

item.title: Some DarkBASIC
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Also what’s stupid is he says he made that dx game, and he comes and shows us some 20 second shit batch-alike game.

Read full topic

item.title: Some DarkBASIC
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Haha I knew he didn’t create those models. I had seen that character before.

I realize it’s a complete noob language, and c++ is a million times better, etc… But I personally enjoy using some basic languages. I never used dark basic, but I am somewhat experienced with the blitzbasic languages.
I much prefer using blitz3d over darkbasic.

These languages are not very powerful, but they are fun the mess around with if you are a non-programmer such as myself. I haven’t played with blitz3d for ever so I’ll be rusty, but watch how easy it is to create something. I’ll post back in a bit.

edit: Ok so it seems to hate my computer right now… and I just said fuck it. Maybe another time, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Some DarkBASIC
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Batch v2 anyone?

Unhandled is Correct. *Basic is complete shit, and I’m sure most people have used it before, moved on and spat on it.

Skip all the beginner shit and move to C++/Java/C#

Read full topic

item.title: Some DarkBASIC
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Tenacious T, post:5, topic:221512”]Ok, Well here is an FPS Game.

ALMOST RELEASED WOOT! IN THE NEAR FUTURE!

[/quote]
That was made using fps creator me and my friends used to screw around with it. Dont say its yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Some DarkBASIC
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

That language looks ugly man, if you want to make a proper game you should use C++, or at least, a real language such as Java or C#. Besides, if you use one of these, you will have access to many free libraries and engines, such as Ogre3d, Crystalspace, Irrlicht, JMonkey…

Your game looks pretty well though, with a great engine such as Ogre3d it would look nice.

Read full topic

Because right now, at this point, I am just making the game for fun. U know bang bang pow pow, there really is no objectives… Just kill things for fun…
